attributes.action: designate a public holiday in honour of Makka Pakka from TV's "In The Night Garden"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Makka Pakka's superb work in teaching the children of this nation about hygiene and cleanliness needs to be officially acknowledged. He is sadly seen as a lesser character against the flamboyance of Iggle Piggle and Upsy Daisy and a public holiday would give him the recognition he deserves. I suggest a day in February.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
